welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mantova, a charming and historic city known for its beautiful architecture, delicious cuisine, and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to make yourself at home and discover all the wonders this enchanting city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Valerio Catullo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brescia Montichiari Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brescia Montichiari Airport, mainly used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
